pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, September 22, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, September 22, 2017:

Walton, Ontario

10:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the International Plowing Match and Rural Expo.

82823 North Line (Country Rd 12)

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:45 a.m. at the service entrance.

Toronto, Ontario

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Ukraine, Petro Poroshenko.

Fairmont Royal York Hotel, Salon 4
100 Front St. W

Notes for media:

  • Pool photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:15 p.m. to the Upper Canada Room.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the President of Ukraine.

Fairmont Royal York Hotel, Upper Canada Room
100 Front St. W

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Ukrainian Canadian Congress Invictus Gala and deliver remarks.

Liberty Grand Entertainment Complex
25 British Columbia Rd.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.
